name: LunarStorm
description: LunarStorm - a place in the Metaverse where innovation and imagination converge in an open Web3 game and dApp ecosystem. LunarStorm is a dynamic platform that brings game developers, players, and creators together to shape and define the future of Web3 gaming. Our mission is to create a limitless gaming universe that fosters collaboration, empowers players, creators, and game studios, and revolutionizes the gaming experience in Web3 and blockchain.
